Sept. 24, 1938 D Crystal Palace (Junior Shield - C (2))
Crystal Palace (Junior Shield - C (2)) 149 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) crystal-palace-junior-shield-c-2
None
Romantique
Alexandra Palace (Putting Green Bandstand), Alexandra Park, Haringey, Greater London, England, UK Prizes: 1st - Champion Journal Cup & £6. Then £5, 4, 3.
There is potential confusion over the draw in the programme used as a source - whoever filled it in did not note that the Hornchurch Children's Home band took up two lines, and entered two draw numbers (vertically above each other) next to them, then continued down to the end, finishing one row short. I have thus applied the draw number from one row above from this band down the alphabetical list. If anyone has a clearer draw, please let us know.
March 7, 2013, 3:42 p.m. July 31, 2014, 10:10 a.m.

2 Medway Imperial J. Lewis

4 Woodfalls Band A. Green
